txt.en:
The bounty notice reads:

Dil-irmíz has become overrun by shades, and we need help fighting them back.

Any willing adventurers who can help reduce their numbers would be welcomed. If you manage to succeed, report back to Zûfan here in Jadambor and you'll be rewarded for your efforts.

They can be dangerous. You may want to bring some companions.
Inform Zûfan in Jadambor that you have defeated shades in the area
A bounty has been posted to reduce the number of shades in the area.
Inform Zûfan in Jadambor that you have defeated shades in the area

You inform Zûfan about the completed bounty.

'Good tidings you bring me. The shades are surely not to stop any time soon, but your efforts will give us time to catch our breath.

'Be sure to check the board for more requests. We need all the help we can get down here.'
You accepted a bounty notice asking you to reduce the number shades in the area to prevent Jadambor from being overrun.
Informed Zûfan of the completed bounty
